Summary Note:
The RM met Celli Donati at a yacht party in Rome. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Celli Donati is a 54 year old Hedge Fund Manager from Italy.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Celli Donati is currently widowed. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Celli earned his secondary school diploma from Liceo Musicale Ottorino Respighi Bologna in 1990.
Celli received his degree from American University of Rome in 1993.
Moreover he completed his extra university education at Bocconi University in 1997.
Occupation History:
Celli Donati is a 54 year old Hedge Fund Manager from Italy. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
At UBM S.p.A., Celli Donati held the position of Investment Banker from 1994 to 1996, developing essential skills in the field.
At Intesa Sanpaolo S.p.A., he held the position of Private Equity Investor from 1997 to 2001, making significant contributions to the organization.
From 2002 till now, he served as a Hedge Fund Manager at UBM S.p.A., solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 790000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He owns flat in Livorno, where he resides. It is worth 600000 EUR.

He inherited a significant sum of 190000 EUR from his mother, a respected Private Equity Manager, in 2012, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Celli as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
